Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Water Temple#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #1# major item.
